tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medical_procedures(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_name VARCHAR(255),
    surgeon_name VARCHAR(255),
    patient_id INT,
    date_performed DATE
)

CREATE TABLE surgeries (
id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
patient_id UUID,
surgery_name VARCHAR,
surgeon_name VARCHAR,
operation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE log_medical_procedures (
    procedure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_name TEXT,
    date_performed DATE,
    physician_name TEXT,
    patient_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE surgery_log (
    surgery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    surgery_type TEXT,
    date_performed DATE,
    surgeon_name TEXT,
    patient_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE medical_notes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    note TEXT,
    date_created DATE,
    physician_name TEXT,
    patient_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE surgeries (
    surgery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    surgery_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    surgery_date DATE,
    surgeon_name TEXT,
    operating_room TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    dob DATE,
    address TEXT,
    contact_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE procedure_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_id INT,
    surgery_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE procedure_log (
    procedure_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    procedure_date DATE NOT NULL,
    surgeon_name VARCHAR(100),
    operating_room_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE surgical_team (
    team_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    team_specialty VARCHAR(100),
    team_lead VARCHAR(100),
    number_of_team_members INT
);

CREATE TABLE patient (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    patient_dob DATE,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
    patient_contact VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE procedure_notes (
    notes_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_id INT,
    note_text TEXT,
    note_date DATE,
    note_author VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE procedure_billing (
    billing_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_id INT,
    billing_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_status VARCHAR(20),
    insurance_provider VARCHAR(100)
);
